name: Ethereal Quest
description:
Created as part of the GoedWare Jam #7.    

A downloadable game for PC

  • W A S D to move 
  • Left Mouse to swing your axe (Light Attack)
  • Hold Right mouse and release for Lance (Charge Attack)
  • Spacebar to Dodge
  • Joost Verbaarschot (website) - Art Director, Environment, Character and Technical Artist 
  • Reuben Pitt (itch) - Programmer
  • Curtis Smith Sound (itch) (instagram) - Technical Audio & UI Designer, Music Composition
  • Victoria Smith (itch) - UI Designer/Graphic Design
